cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 29th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 29th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Located on the upper floor, the mixed dorm is a great room to lay your head at the end of a fun packed day.
Perfect for the budget conscious, who don't want to compromise on locations, safety, scenery, and amenities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Located on the upper floor, offering ocean views out to the horizon. 
A few steps down the hall you will find our sun filled TV/lounge, Kitchen and dining rooms with the most picturesque landscape views for you to soak up and enjoy.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Twin Room located on the Ground floor, a few steps away from the communal areas. Offering a garden and sneaky ocean view, a great choice for the budget conscious single/duo who don't want to compromise on location, scenery and shared amenities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Located on the upper floor, offering Queen bed with side views of Mount Fyffe and the beautiful Kaikoura's towering over the bay, A great choice for the budget conscious single/duo who don't want to compromise on location, scenery and amenities.

privates.name: Superior 5 Bed Family Room Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Located on the upper floor with north facing, 180 degree, un-obstructed mountain and sea views.
A great choice for the budget conscious ANYONE wishing to immerse themselves in the most picturesque landscape views Kaikoura has to offer.
